- Institutional Markets 199 | Government Markets 201  
* REVIEWING AND EXTENDING THE CONCEPTS 203 | OBJECTIVES REVIEW AND KEY TERMS 203 | Objectives Review 203 | Key Terms 204 | DISCUSSION AND CRITICAL THINKING 204 | Discussion Questions 204 | Critical Thinking Exercises 205 | APPLICATIONS AND CASES 205 | Online, Mobile, and Social Media Marketing: E-procurement and Mobile Procurement 205 | Marketing Ethics: Innocent: Proven Guilty? 205 | Marketing by the Numbers: NAICS 206 | Video Case: Eaton 206 | Company Case: Procter & Gamble: Treating Business Customers as Strategic Partners 206 Video Case: Plymouth Rock Assurance 275 | Company Case: Airbnb: Making Hospitality Authentic 275
summary_markdown: This content outlines the review and application sections for a chapter, likely focusing on business-to-business marketing concepts. It details specific topics covered, including Institutional Markets and Government Markets, with corresponding page numbers. The review section is further broken down into Objectives Review and Key Terms. The Applications and Cases segment presents a variety of real-world examples and analytical tools, such as Online, Mobile, and Social Media Marketing (specifically e-procurement and mobile procurement), Marketing Ethics (illustrated by a case on Innocent), Marketing by the Numbers (focusing on NAICS), and several Video and Company Cases. These cases involve diverse businesses like Eaton, Procter & Gamble, Plymouth Rock Assurance, and Airbnb, highlighting different aspects of business marketing strategies and practices.
